items.summary:
1.2.4 released. Just some fixes.
- Added version requirement for Combat Activators to prevent a crash if you didn't update it to at least 1.1.0.
items.description:
1.2.4 released. Just some fixes.
- Added version requirement for Combat Activators to prevent a crash if you didn't update it to at least 1.1.0.
- Toroid Mortars: somehow 0.96 broke the projectile glow on these? fuckin weird. anyway, it's fixed
- Shrieker Torpedoes: Reduced damage to 600 HE + 400 frag and increased targeting spread by about 20%.
- Aizawa and Dadras now have custom system AI and should be much more aggressive about using their dampers.

direct download: https://github.com/theDragn/ApexDesignCollective/releases/download/1.2.4/Apex.Design.Collective_v1.2.4.zip

items.name: Ashes of The Domain
items.summary: This is very important  announcement of AoTD
items.description:
This is very important  announcement of AoTD 

I was thinking about it for loooooong time recently and i played with new ind Evo and to be fair their goverments are god damn well executed. And i think idea of Seats of Power would only made all things complicated, because whatever I came up with it only complicates things , rather than making them Simple.  Last 48 hours i have gathered a lot of data that was crucial for me 

After analyzing data I  decided this will be the best cause of action to take 

Seats of Power will be deleted from Mod Forums and development will be fully halted. Instead my focus will fully remain for now with Vaults of Knowledge and Lost Glory as those are two most popular modules  already established with unique cotnent. Especially that Vaults of Knowledge right now needs polishing which opens for me window for Lost Glory development 

Also at this point Seats of Power only makes AoTD to look more i would say "bad" in terms being very poorly Executed module 

Sorry for this but i think this is for the best for AoTD

items.name: Customizable Star Systems (v1.0.0)
items.summary: Create your own custom star systems via a JSON file in this mod's config folder! Includes a default custom star system, with superb candidates for colonization.
items.description:
Create your own custom star systems via a JSON file in this mod's config folder! Includes a default custom star system, with superb candidates for colonization.

*v1.0.0 Summary*
```
* Split off from Adversary mod

* Revamped the customStarSystem.json format

* Updated referenceStarSystem.json and presetStarSystems.json with the updated format

* Added "SpawnCustomStarSystems" and "ListCustomStarSystems" commands

* Added a LunaSnippet for spawning in custom star systems

* Updated source code and package names
```
```Save-compatible```
**Download (requires either LunaLib or Java 8):** <https://github.com/Tranquiliti/CustomizableStarSystems/releases/download/v1.0.0/CustomizableStarSystems-v1.0.0.zip>
Releases and Changelogs: <https://github.com/Tranquiliti/CustomizableStarSystems/releases>

If anyone is experiencing a crash that says something like this in the log (at the bottom), please use this WIP version. There are no gameplay related changes in this WIP version, just many under-the-hood stuff, and a fix for this issue
```com.fs.starfarer.combat.CombatMain  - java.lang.NullPointerException
items.description:
If anyone is experiencing a crash that says something like this in the log (at the bottom), please use this WIP version. There are no gameplay related changes in this WIP version, just many under-the-hood stuff, and a fix for this issue
```com.fs.starfarer.combat.CombatMain  - java.lang.NullPointerException
    at lyravega.listeners.lyr_tabListener.attach(lyr_tabListener.java:29)
    at lyravega.plugin.lyr_ehm.attachShuntAccessListener(lyr_ehm.java:133)
    at lyravega.plugin.lyr_ehm.onGameLoad(lyr_ehm.java:40)```

items.name: Exotica Technologies
items.summary:
updated to 1.6.3
```
items.description:
updated to 1.6.3
```
    buffed exotic and upgrade drop rates from enemy fleets
    fixed drive flux vent AI activation, and it now has reduced cooldown (15s to 10s)
    updated terminator subsystems AI to use drones more frequently if it has more
    fixed drone stuff applying to modules
    fixed pain from dropping as part of certain ships (it is now removed after battle)
    noticed that pure type exotics were the most used ones:
    -- corrupted type exotics positive mult increased (150% to 200%), and negative mult (150% to 175%)
    -- guerilla type exotics positive mult increased (175% to 200%). note that it still scales with fleet size
    blocked alpha subcore from having any effect if the SHU Armament Support System is installed
    -- additionally prevented alpha subcore from being installed if the SHU Armament Support System is installed
    multiple UI level improvements
    -- upgrades and exotics now display both description and effects at once
    -- overview tab is now the main source to view all upgrades/exotics that your ship has at once
    -- removed hullmod expanding info
```

items.name: Musashi Manufactorum Ship and Weapon Packs 1.4.2
items.summary: Battleship in space! They are based from various battleships such as Yamato, Iowa, Richelieu. Their sizes are not proportional to each other as you can see. I try my best to make them balance while enjoyable as artillery ship. The name are based on Japanese deities and folklore. Hope you guys enjoy it.
items.description:
Battleship in space! They are based from various battleships such as Yamato, Iowa, Richelieu. Their sizes are not proportional to each other as you can see. I try my best to make them balance while enjoyable as artillery ship. The name are based on Japanese deities and folklore. Hope you guys enjoy it. 

The ships are mostly appears in pirate/independent/mercs fleets and black markets. Their blueprints are spread around vanilla blueprints package and musashi unique packages.

Full description: https://fractalsoftworks.com/forum/index.php?topic=21692.0
Download (direct): https://www.patreon.com/file?h=85803207&i=15099207

Change log (1.4.2):
- Add two new ships Isetsu and Kurao. One is a phase ship. They can be spawned by pirates and are independent but very rare. They can be obtained through the black market or their own rare bp!
- The phase ship might be a bust so let me know what you think.
- Fix Ebisu_L weapon mounts not line up properly.
- Update sprites of Amaterasu and Mikaboshi. Now they look a bit more like a precious flagship.

Next:
- Probably more ships/weapons and see if there is a way to created bounty for them.

items.summary:
Probably our biggest beta patch so far, not save compatible.
```diff
items.description:
Probably our biggest beta patch so far, not save compatible.
```diff
- NOT SAVE COMPATIBLE WITH BETA8 OR PRIOR
``````fix
Version 1.5.0 Beta9

- added 8 weapons to the abyssal faction
- remade all ship loadouts and added some more variety (no more reaper spam)
- probably completely unbalanced so make sure to ping me for dumb stuff.

- revamped the "Abyssal Crew Conversion" Alterations to now be just one hullmod, with the core integration being a seperate option that now requires you to use either core.
- derelict abyssal ship wrecks now spawn in the abyss.
- wrecks from the abyssal faction can be recovered with the Abysal Crew Conversion Alteration if the player doesnt have the automated ships skill.

- added two more hull alteration.
- improved a few sprites, notably replacing the aboleths phase glow with a revamped version.
- hardmode now has slight player fleet scaling, which should make fighting them with overleveled fleets slightly more fun. The scaling however is rather limited.

- several balance changes.
- abyssal fleets have a slightly lower sensor range now.
- reduced the drop rates of instrument items and slightly reduced the drop rates of alterations.
- fixed artifacts not applying to ships added to the fleet after the artifact has been activated.
- fixed the mod accidentaly overwriting the radiant description.
- fixed abyssal core hullmod description missing on ships with dmods.
- possibly fixed some of the ship glows appearing in combat if the ship isnt deployed.
```

items.name: Refit Filters
items.summary: A Hullmod that filters weapons according to certain characteristics.
items.description:
A Hullmod that filters weapons according to certain characteristics.

Adds a single new hullmod that applies filters to the refit weapon menu. A Spiritual successor to ruddygreat's Filter Hullmods.

The following filters are currently implemented.
- Damage type
- Range
- Beam / Projectile
- Point Defense / Non Point Defense

Download: https://github.com/Starficz/RefitFilters/releases/download/1.0.0/RefitFilters.zip
Source: https://github.com/Starficz/RefitFilters

items.name: SMOL, a mod manager
items.summary: ## Beta 15
items.description:
## Beta 15

To update, launch SMOL and follow the update prompt.
In case of "Access is denied" error (Windows Defender false positive), see "Auto-Update broken?" video above.

New: **Tip Deleter**
- See which mods tips came from...
- And remove them!
- Deleted tips are remembered even when you update a mod  

Notes: Tips are removed from all versions of a mod that you have. Removing a tip rewrites the tip file after creating a backup (so any comments from the author are removed). There is no "undo", but since it creates a backup in the tips folder, you can just swap back.

**Also**
- There is now **experimental Linux and MacOS** support, but you have to build it yourself, sorry 🙂 Thank you to <@615999112692891658> for adding the Linux support!
- Fixed download notifications (I hope, they work for me anyway) and added notifs for download errors.
- Disabled mods are no longer enabled when you use the one-click updater.
- Mod profiles are now sorted by last updated.

items.name: Tore Up Plenty - Vanilla Friendly Mod - Campaign+Nexerelin
Volantian Reclamation Initiative 0.3.2 "VIndication"
items.summary: Well, since i've begun development for VRI again (barely), i figured that it would be neat to share my future plans for 0.4.
items.description:
Well, since i've begun development for VRI again (barely), i figured that it would be neat to share my future plans for 0.4.

Story content~
I am currently adding several more unique worlds for the purposes of exploring, researching, and exploiting for personal gain. 

I am also updating certain encounters and creating new ones, so the player can interact with the Volantian Intelligence and Special Operations Command (VISOC).

Furthermore, I'm going to create more relics and lost colonies/sites of the Volantian Empire. So look forward to more story stuff, i guess.

Ships & Weapons~
I am currently doing a massive overhaul of Volantian weapons, balancing them properly (finally) and adding unique effects to each weapon depending on the mounted slot. This will also be accompanied, by, you guessed it, new weapons!

Furthermore, I'm cutting (and adding) a few hulls to spice things up a bit.

I currently have two stations planned, so those should be fun. It's about time i made a VRI nexus.

Final notes~
Please fill out the google response form
If you have ideas, let me know, my DMs are open
Thank you so much everyone, for your continued support!
